step_feedback.feedback: Good job clasping your hands in your lap. Keep your elbows relaxed.
You're raising your hands well. Try to keep your elbows a bit closer together as you bring them towards your forehead.
Excellent job spreading your elbows wide behind your head. This is a great stretch for your chest and shoulders.
Holding the stretch steady. Remember to keep your head upright and avoid leaning forward.
Nicely done reversing the motion. You're returning to the starting position smoothly.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Remember to keep your elbows close when raising your hands, and focus on a steady hold to maximize the stretch. Keep up the good work!
